product_name: Life is good Crusher T-Shirt - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: With outdoors-inspired graphics and a soft cotton feel, the Life is good(R) Crusher T-Shirt an easy choice for casual outings. "Crushing" process yields extra loft in fabric and doubles the softness. Closeout.
